消費税: (しょうひぜい) - consumption tax (incl. sales tax, VAT, excise duty, etc.)

消費者主権: (しょうひしゃしゅけん) - consumer sovereignty

消費者信用: (しょうひしゃしんよう) - consumer credit
消費者信用保護法: (しょうひしゃしんようほごほう) - consumer credit protection act
消費者側: (しょうひしゃがわ) - consumers side
消費者受容: (しょうひしゃじゅよう) - consumer acceptance
消費者団体: (しょうひしゃだんたい) - consumer group
消費者市場: (しょうひしゃいちば) - consumer market
消費者心情: (しょうひしゃしんじょう) - consumer sentiment
消費者態度指数: (しょうひしゃたいどしすう) - {econ} consumer confidence index; CCI; consumer attitude index
消費者支出: (しょうひしゃししゅつ) - consumer spending
消費者文化: (しょうひしゃぶんか) - consumer culture
消費者物価: (しょうひしゃぶっか) - consumer prices
消費者物価指数: (しょうひしゃぶっかしすう) - consumer price index; CPI

消費者運動: (しょうひしゃうんどう) - consumer movement

消費者関係: (しょうひしゃかんけい) - consumer relations
消費者需要: (しょうひしゃじゅよう) - consumer demand
消費量: (しょうひりょう) - amount of consumption
消費関数: (しょうひかんすう) - consumption function
消費電力: (しょうひでんりょく) - electricity consumption
消費革命: (しょうひかくめい) - consumer revolution; consumption revolution
消長: (しょうちょう) - prosperity and decay; prosperity and decline; rise and fall; ups and downs; ebb and flow; waxing and waning
消長盛衰: (しょうちょうせいすい) - (yoji) prosperity and decay; rise and fall; ebb and flow; vicissitudes (of fortune)
消防: (しょうぼう) - fire fighting; fire department
消防カバー: (しょうぼうカバー) - fire blanket
消防ポンプ: (しょうぼうポンプ) - fire pump
消防団: (しょうぼうだん) - fire brigade or company
消防庁: (しょうぼうちょう) - Fire and Disaster Management Agency (formerly: Fire Defense Agency) (Defence)
消防法: (しょうぼうほう) - Fire Services Act; fire laws
消防署員: (しょうぼうしょいん) - fire station worker; member of a fire station
消防署長: (しょうぼうしょちょう) - fire captain; fire marshal
消防船: (しょうぼうせん) - fire boat; fireboat
消防車両: (しょうぼうしゃりょう) - fire-engine
消防隊: (しょうぼうたい) - fire brigade; fire company
消除: (しょうじょ) - deletion; removal; elimination; erasure; cancellation; revocation
消雪: (しょうせつ) - snow melting (usu. a system or device); snow removal
消雪パイプ: (しょうせつパイプ) - pipe buried under a road with nozzles that spray liquid to melt snow
消音: (しょうおん) - silencing (e.g. machine); muffling; muting (e.g. TV)
消音器: (しょうおんき) - (car) muffler; (piano) damper pedal; (gun) silencer
涌き: (わき) - welling (up)/gushing forth (of water)/springing out/surging; appearing (esp. suddenly); frothing of water (due to an advancing school of fish)
涌き上る: (わきあがる) - (esp. 沸き上がる) to boil up/to come to the boil/to seethe; to arise/to break out; to get excited/to be in uproar
涌き起こる: (わきおこる) - to well up; to burst; to arise
涌き起る: (わきおこる) - to well up; to burst; to arise
涌く: (わく) - to well (up)/to gush forth (of water)/to spring out/to surge; to appear (esp. suddenly) (sweat, tears, etc.); to feel emotions form (joy, bravery, etc.); to hatch (esp. of parasitic insects, etc.)
涌出: (ようしゅつ) - gushing out; welling up; springing up
涌泉: (ゆうせん) - bubbling spring; gushing spring; fountain
涎をだす: (よだれをだす) - to drool; to salivate
涎を垂らす: (よだれをたらす) - to drool; to dribble; to slobber
涎掛け: (よだれかけ) - bib (esp. for infants and statues)
涔々: (しんしん) - falling heavily (of rain, snow, etc.)
涔涔: (しんしん) - falling heavily (of rain, snow, etc.)
涙: (rui/namida) - tears , tear, tears, lachrymal secretion; sympathy
涙ぐましい: (なみだぐましい) - touching; moving; painful
涙ぐむ: (なみだぐむ) - to be moved to tears
涙する: (namidasuru) - chorar, derramar lágrimas, emocionar-se até às lágrimas
涙ながら: (なみだながら) - while crying; in tears
涙まじり: (なみだまじり) - (doing something) in tears
涙もろい: (なみだもろい) - easily moved to tears
涙を催す: (なみだをもよおす) - to be moved to tears
涙を呑む: (なみだをのむ) - to pocket an insult; to choke back one's tears
涙を流す: (なみだをながす) - to shed tears
涙を誘う: (なみだをさそう) - to move to tears; to draw tears; to evoke tears
涙乍ら: (なみだながら) - while crying; in tears
涙交じり: (なみだまじり) - (doing something) in tears
涙嚢: (るいのう) - {anat} lachrymal sac; tear sac; dacryocyst
涙堂: (るいどう) - eye bags; periorbital puffiness
